question: when did we decide to leave the eu
api_result: The decision for the United Kingdom to leave the European Union was made following a referendum held on June 23, 2016. In that referendum, approximately 52% of voters chose to leave the EU, while about 48% voted to remain. The formal process of leaving the EU, known as Brexit, began when the UK government triggered Article 50 of the Treaty on European Union on March 29, 2017. The UK officially left the EU on January 31, 2020.
